column4: I am having an issue getting my webcam to work with tinychat and other web based flash applications. Can anyone help me? Also, in stickam the chats themselves look very glitchy to me and my cam doesnt work sometimes. Tinychat doesnt work at all.

I am having an issue getting my webcam to work with tinychat and other web based flash applications. Can anyone help me? Also, in stickam the chats themselves look very glitchy to me and my cam doesnt work sometimes. Tinychat doesnt work at all.
